Best Quality Stainless Steel Pipes Stainless Steel Sheet

Shanxi Steel is a leading manufacturer and supplier of stainless steel pipes stainless steel sheets, offering exceptional quality, durability, and versatility for various industrial and commercial applications.

Top Stainless Steel Pipe Manufacturer in China

As a leading stainless steel pipe manufacturer in China, we pride ourselves on achieving premium quality products to meet the diverse needs of industrial applications. With extensive experience in steel fabrication, our state-of-the-art manufacturing facility consistently produces premium quality material.

Grades

Our stainless steel pipes include various grades, sizes, and finishes, catering to applications in various sectors and petrochemical, automotive, and food processing. We continually employ cutting-edge technology to ensure safe and sustainable products.

Standards

ASTM A312, A213, A269, A789, A790, A688 | ASME SA-312, SA-213, SA-269, SA-789, SA-790, SA-688 | EN 10216-5, ISO 1127

Specifications: OD1/8"-24", WT 0.035"-0.250", CS-TP 304/316L | 2507 | 6MO | 254SMO | Super Duplex

Size

6*1, 1/8" in 16 & 1" x 3/8", 1" x 1/4"

Applications

Fluid and gas pipelines, Food and beverage processing equipment, Pharmaceutical manufacturing facilities, Pulp and paper mills

SS Pipe Applications

  • ●Oil and gas pipelines
  • ●Food and beverage production equipment
  • ●Pharmaceutical manufacturing facilities
  • ●Pulp and paper mills
  • ●Desalination plants
  • ●Transportation systems

SS Pipe Advantages

  • ●Corrosion resistance
  • ●High strength at extreme conditions
  • ●Temperature resistance (both high and low)
  • ●Long-term durability
  • ●Hygienic and easy to clean
  • ●Excellent aesthetic appeal

Key Factors in Selecting Stainless Steel Tubing

Cost and budget constraints

Compliance with industry standards

Manufacturer reputation and customer reviews

Customization capabilities and flexibility

Technical specifications (pressure, thickness, length)

Surface finish and material options
